title: 103_hr2725
content: Dwight D. Eisenhower Mathematics and Science Education Amendments of 1993 - Amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to revise provisions for mathematics and science education grants and programs with respect to: (1) in-State apportionment, (2) elementary and secondary education programs, (3) higher education programs, (4) technical assistance and evaluation, (5) administrative costs, and (6) State and local applications.
